SEARCH
Package main.java.neat.core

Class Agent

java.lang.Object
main.java.neat.core.Agent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Agent extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an individual agent in the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm. Each agent contains a neural network genome that can be evolved, and maintains fitness information used during the evolutionary process.
Author:
Taher Joudeh

    • think

      public double[] think(double[] input)
      Processes input values through the agent's neural network.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • decide

      public boolean[] decide(double[] input)
      Processes input values and returns thresholded boolean decisions. Output values that hit the activation threshold are considered true, others false.
      Parameters:
      input - Array of input values for the neural network.
      Returns:
      Array of boolean decisions based on network outputs.
